JointDrillControl.510001.2: She wears fear as her etiquette and feeds despair with paranoia.In her repertoire, she performs the most ancient of nightmare.
JointDrillControl.510001.3:
During A Finale Echoing, you get 3 challenge attempts per day. You can choose any unlocked difficulty, and rewards include tokens and ranking points.

Each challenge phase lets you deploy multiple squads across several rounds, but Trekkers cannot be used in more than one squad.

Winning grants points based on difficulty and battle time. Even if time runs out or all attempts are used, you'll still earn points.

Accumulate points throughout the event to claim Mission Rewards.
